x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-ka-šu₂ is-si-šu₂ la ta-sa-lim pi-i is-si-šu₂ la ta-ša₂-kan ta-pa-lah₃-an-ni SIG₅-ia te-pa-aš₂-ma šum-ma SIG₅-ia te-ta-pa-aš₂ x x x {KUR}a-ru-bu gab-bu x x x x x x-bu x x x x x x-di-u šum-ma a-na-ku ina UGU-hi-ka x x x x x al-lak x x x x x x+x-bi pi-i-šu₂ x x x x x TA IGI-ka pa-ti-u-ni x x x x tu-še-ṣa x x x šak-na-šu-u-ni x x lu-šam-ri-ṣu x x 01-en ina ŠA₃ ARAD-MEŠ-ka x x x KUR ša₂-ni-tim-ma x x x x x x at x lu-u ina ŠU.2 KU₆ ša₂ tam-tim lu-u ina ŠU.2 MUŠEN ša₂ AN-e la ta-šap-par šum-ma at-ta ta-qab-bu-u-ni ma-a a-lik a-na LUGAL am-mi₃-e qi-bi ma-a an-nu-rig LUGAL KUR-aš-šur ina UGU-hi-ka il-la-ka nik-lu me-me-ni us-se-IL ina UGU-hi-ka a-na e-pa-ši u₃ a-bu-tu₂ am-mar ta-šam-mu-ni lu-u TA pi-i 01-en LUGAL-MEŠ lu-u TA pa-an 01-et KUR-MEŠ ša ina UGU-hi-ni ina UGU KUR-aš-šur qur-bu-u-ni la ṭa-bu-u-ni TA IGI-ia la tu-pa-zar a-na a.a-ši ta-šap-pa-ra tu-ša₂-aš₂-man-ni dib-bi am-mar ša₂ a-na-ku is-si-ka a-da-bu-ub-u-ni x x x x x-pi am-mar ša₂ a-me-lu-ti x x x x x x x-ṣa x x x x x x x-su x x x x x x x-ka
